mapper.select: select b._num as num, (case when b._released_date is not null and b._released_date <= b._end_date then 1 when b._released_date is null and b._end_date >= CURDATE() then 2 when b._released_date is not null and b._released_date > b._end_date then 3 when b._released_date is null and b._end_date < CURDATE() then 4 else 5 end) status,a._content as demand,a._workload as quantity,b._end_date as end_date, b._start_date as start_date, b._released_date as released_date from zt_story a , zt_build b where a._id = b._id and a._content like CONCAT('%',#{content},'%') limit 20
